attractions.name: Sahara Desert
attractions.description: The Sahara Desert is the world's largest hot desert, and one of the harshest environments on the planet.

attractions.name: Todgha Gorge
attractions.description: Todgha Gorge is a canyon in the eastern part of the High Atlas Mountains in Morocco, near the town of Tinghir.

attractions.name: Ait Benhaddou
attractions.description: Ait Benhaddou is a fortified city along the former caravan route between the Sahara and Marrakech.

attractions.name: Erfoud
attractions.description: Erfoud is known for its fossils, with numerous shops selling fossils and minerals.

attractions.name: Ziz Valley
attractions.description: The Ziz Valley is a large oasis in the eastern part of Morocco, known for its palm groves and scenic landscapes.

attractions.name: Tafilalt Oasis
attractions.description: The Tafilalt Oasis is one of the largest oases in Morocco, providing fertile land for agriculture.

attractions.name: Ouarzazate
attractions.description: Ouarzazate is a city in southern Morocco, known as the gateway to the Sahara Desert and for its film studios.

attractions.name: Dades Gorge
attractions.description: Dades Gorge is a gorge in the Atlas Mountains in Morocco, known for its stunning rock formations and scenic views.
